title: DoodleOfTheDay
description: DoodleOfTheDay is a new daily challenge game for all wordle and puzzle enthusiasts. The game works by you (i.e. user) trying to guess what the shape/doodle of the day is on a grid, with limited attempts and correct/wrong lines guiding you with each attempt. You win the game by guessing the shape of the day within the number of attempts and not exceeding the maximum limit to the total number of lines you draw.
